column4: HiddenFly, I am following some instructions to install a printer and I am being asked to type '/etc/init.d/cups restart' but in ubuntu cups is not in that directory. is cupsys equivalent?

Sorry I meant to ask the whole channel, I am following some instructions to install a printer and I am being asked to type '/etc/init.d/cups restart' but in ubuntu cups is not in that directory. is cupsys equivalent?
